aircraft.value: Cobra Advanced - AC-1934-440 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Ballistics computer calculation error. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Targeting System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 14/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 16/10/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 17/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 18/10/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 21/10/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer
